safetyInstructions.instruction1: Stay calm and assess the situation without panic.
safetyInstructions.instruction2: Sound the alarm if safe, to alert others.
safetyInstructions.instruction3: Evacuate immediately using the nearest exit or emergency route.
safetyInstructions.instruction4: Stay low and cover nose and mouth with a cloth in smoky areas.
safetyInstructions.instruction5: Do not re-enter until authorities declare it safe.
safetyInstructions.instruction6: Act swiftly, prioritize evacuation, and assist others if possible.
